alert.note: Alert for Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 5:14PM CDT until July 18 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in north central Alabama... South central Moore County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Lincoln County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Franklin County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 545 PM CDT * At 513 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lynchburg to near Hazel Green to Harvest, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Redstone Arsenal, Hazel Green, Huntland, Marshall Space Flight Center, Harvest and Alabama A And M University. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
